column5: Can you visualise yourself working with computer systems that have the potential to change the way we live forever? Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a rapidly developing area of computer science, which creates computer systems capable of human intelligence and/or interaction.Northumbria University’s master’s in Artificial Intelligence provides an exciting opportunity to take your career into the rapidly developing area of AI. We welcome applications from candidates of any background, whether you wish to specialise your existing knowledge, or want to completely change your career direction.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
